channel.title: personal on www.freniche.com
channel.description: Recent content in personal on www.freniche.com

item.title: Leaving Teamwork
item.description: 6th of May will be my last “official” day at Teamwork. Now I’m on my 2nd Annual Leave week, so effectively I’m out of the company since last Friday April 23th. Leaving a job can or can’t be a big deal. It depends on how invested you’re in it, how much you need the money, your personal / finances situation, etc. For me, as excited and happy I am about my next role, this is a sad event.

item.title: I love listening to music
item.description: I love listening to music. I can’t play any instrument, but I do enjoy listening to each note in a song, identifying the instruments, getting emotional with the lyrics of a music piece. Getting those goosebumps. Being a product of my time and age, I mostly listen to 80’s and 90’s songs, with some modern additions thrown into the mix. I hate Reggaeton and Trap with the power of a thousand suns, but that’s for a different post.
